Question.Subject: what kind of browser should i install? which one is the better one too?
Question.Content:
google chrome, firefox, and are there any more
what site can i download a browser from and its legit? like no virus, etc....
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I use Firefox and I wouldn't change
I have used IE , Chrome , Opera , Avant and Safari
Google their names and go to their home page , or go to Download.com to download programs
When it comes to browsers , its all down to personal choice

Answer.Content:
I use Firefox and I wouldn't change
I have used IE , Chrome , Opera , Avant and Safari
Google their names and go to their home page , or go to Download.com to download programs
When it comes to browsers , its all down to personal choice

Well in order of what i like best is
All of these browsers except internet explorer work for Windows and Mac
Opera - http://www.opera.com/
Safari - http://www.apple.com/safari/download/
Firefox - http://www.mozilla.com/en-US/firefox/personal.html
Internet Explorer 8 - http://www.microsoft.com/nz/windows/internet-explorer/default.aspx
and Google Chrome - http://www.google.com/chrome
internet explorer also...but i recommend Google chrome because it is easy to view multiple web pages and has applications you can add onto your webpage, preference always varies among people though
Google Chrome is best. Internet Explorer is decent also. I dunno about the download, though.

G'day Alesana,
Thank you for your question.
It is really a matter of personal taste. I use Google Chrome myself.
In the comparison below, Firefox was rated top followed by Chrome and Internet Explorer.
Regards

I use internet explorer 8, and firefox 3.6 I would never allow any of the other web browsers to be on my computer. I have tried them all. Both of those are the top rated web browsers.
Compare Browser Speed http://www.nsslabs.com/test-reports/Q309_Browser_Security_Summary_Final.pdf
Use Apple Safari or Firefox.Don't use Chrome-It's only Hype. http://download.cnet.com/ Download from this Site-its Safe :)
